mdes.slick.sui
Interface ScrollConstants

All Known Subinterfaces:
ScrollBarAppearance, ScrollPaneAppearance, SliderAppearance
All Known Implementing Classes:
ScrollBar, ScrollPane, SimpleScrollBarAppearance, SimpleScrollPaneAppearance, SimpleSliderAppearance, Slider
public interface ScrollConstants

This class contains a set of constants used with scroll bars and scrollable components (such as sliders).

Field Summary
static int DECREMENT
          A constant for the "decrement" direction of a SuiScrollBar (-1).
static int DEFAULT_SIZE
           
static int HORIZONTAL
          A constant to indicate horizontal orientation of a SuiScrollBar.
static int INCREMENT
          A constant for the "increment" direction of a SuiScrollBar (1).
static int VERTICAL
          A constant to indicate vertical orientation of a SuiScrollBar.
 

Field Detail

DEFAULT_SIZE

public static final int DEFAULT_SIZE
See Also:
Constant Field Values

INCREMENT

public static final int INCREMENT
A constant for the "increment" direction of a SuiScrollBar (1). This direction usually deals with the up (for vertical) and right (for horizontal) buttons on a scroll bar.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DECREMENT

public static final int DECREMENT
A constant for the "decrement" direction of a SuiScrollBar (-1). This direction usually deals with the down (for vertical) and left (for horizontal) buttons on a scroll bar.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

HORIZONTAL

public static final int HORIZONTAL
A constant to indicate horizontal orientation of a SuiScrollBar.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

VERTICAL

public static final int VERTICAL
A constant to indicate vertical orientation of a SuiScrollBar.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
